price: 51. Annagaa (Alle ah) u gargaari Rusuhayada iyo kuwa rumeeyey noloshan adduunka iyo Maalintay markhaatiyadu istaagi.
arabic: إِنَّا لَنَنصُرُ رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَيَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡأَشۡهَٰدُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā lananṣuru rusulanā wa-alladhīna āmanū fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wayawma yaqūmu al-ashhādu
